title: Can I change my course after first year?

comments.body:
If you mean like changing from ECE to CS or something like that then yes you can. You can do it at the end of 2nd sem/ beginning of 3rd sem. 

Transfer to CS (RR campus) usually require 9.5 ish GPA


Transfer to CS (EC campus) or ECE (RR campus) usually require 8 ish GPA

Not sure about other branches. Should be around 7.5-8.5 ish.
